document.full_text: iranian police expelled a group of soccer fans who were chanting anti-saudi slogans during an asian champions league match, the website of state english-language television press tv reported on wednesday.
document.title: iran police quell anti-saudi protest at soccer match
lines_and_colors: iranian police expelled a group of soccer fans who were chanting anti-saudi slogans during an asian champions league match, the website of state english-language television press tv reported on wednesday.
